See the paper by Selim Sami, explaining a pragmatic way to capture chemical reactivity in Martini with the clever use of virtual sites: [https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.jctc.2c01186](https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.jctc.2c01186).

All the required input files together with tutorials on its use are provided as SI.
